nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 13

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 13 is the thirteenth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It contained instructions for constructing the internal chassis of the buildable R2-D2 and a temporary support stand for the droid..
